title: Audit API Security
description: An IT auditor reviews the security controls for the company's public-facing APIs.

tasks.description: Review the API documentation to ensure it does not expose sensitive information.
Verify that all APIs require authentication, such as an API key or OAuth token.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor confirms authentication is enforced on all API endpoints.

tasks.description: Verify that rate limiting is implemented to prevent denial-of-service attacks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor sends a high volume of test requests and confirms they are throttled correctly.
